articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Sympathy to Crown Prince of Thailand
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Message of Sympathy to Crown Prince of Thailand
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, on Saturday sent a message of sympathy to Maha Vajiralongkorn, crown prince of Thailand.
					 The message said:
					
					 Upon hearing the sad news of the demise of Bhumibol Adulyadej, king of Thailand, I offer my profound condolences and sympathy to Your Highness and, through you, to the bereaved family and the government and people of the Kingdom of Thailand.
					
					 His Majesty Bhumibol Adulyadej valued the friendly and cooperative ties between the DPRK and Thailand and made a great contribution to the development of the ties.
					
					 Although His Majesty Bhumibol Adulyadej, passed away, his noble exploits will always be remembered by the two peoples and progressive mankind.

articles.title: Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts U.S. Official's Remarks Hurting Dignity of Supreme Leadership of DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts U.S. Official's Remarks Hurting Dignity of Supreme Leadership of DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK issued the following statement on Saturday:
					 The U.S. hostile acts of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK have now reached the point of self-contradiction, going far beyond the tolerance limit.
					
					 Rassel, U.S. assistant secretary of State for East Asia-Pacific Affairs, on Oct. 12 had the temerity of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and blustering that the DPRK would come to its end the moment it acquires the capability to mount a nuclear attack.
					
					 This is the most blatant challenge to the DPRK and a hostile act of putting into practice a declaration of war against the DPRK.
					
					 The extreme vituperation let out by him is a paradox making profound confusion of the right and wrong. The reality is quite contrary to what he uttered.
					
					 The moment the U.S. comes in attack on the DPRK, the White House will come to an end before anything else.
					
					 The anti-DPRK invectives reeled off by this guy is the last-ditch efforts aimed to evade the responsibility for endangering the security of the U.S. mainland as a whole by pushing the DPRK to become the most powerful nuclear weapons state now that the Obama group's DPRK policy proved to be totally bankrupt before its ouster.
					
					 He, who had been reportedly in charge of the DPRK policy for the past two decades, is so ignorant of the DPRK. So pitiful is the fate of the American people who depend on such minions for the security of the country.
					
					 Being seized by megalomania that it can do whatever it wants, the U.S. has become blind in facing up to the world. It is, therefore, unable to judge that the DPRK is not such a country which it can make obedient to Washington.
					
					 What Rassel uttered is just a squeak of a rat but behind him there is shrill cry of Obama.
					
					 The DPRK will remain unperturbed by the useless wriggling of Obama, but the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK including the highly developed nuclear force will never miss the target as they regard it as their primary mission to safeguard the supreme leadership.
					
					 The U.S. will have to pay a high price for malignantly hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, and Obama will come to understand the meaning of the price before he leaves the White House.

articles.title: Women's Organization Slams Undisguised Maltreatment of Children in S. Korea
articles.content:
Women's Organization Slams Undisguised Maltreatment of Children in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Central Committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea Saturday gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA as regards the rampant maltreatment of children in south Korea:
					According to the data released by the puppet National Assembly recently, the cases of maltreatment of children in the recent five years numbered a total of 40,999 including the murder of 197 children under 12 years and last year witnessed 11,715 cases.
					
					This goes to prove that this crime has doubled since Park Geun Hye took power as cases of maltreatment of children reached 6,058 in 2011.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the fact that nurses made no scruple of leaving naked children outside in winter, detaining children in rooms with handkerchiefs put into their mouths or throwing them out from the second floor of the building.
					
					 Such harshest maltreatment of children in the world is an inevitable result of the corrupt and ailing social system in south Korea.
					
					 Park who has not experienced what mother's love for children is like talked such nonsense as "responsible childcare system" and "improved free childcare" when taking office, but the maltreatment of children has become ever more rampant. This is the reality of south Korea.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the Park group is nosily talking about someone's "human rights" to do harm to the compatriots in the north while shutting its eyes to the deplorable human rights situation in south Korea.
					
					 As an adage says a dirty place is full of maggots, Park lets human scum who defected from the north after committing indelible crimes spout a stream of outbursts about someone's "human rights." She must be a psychopath and foolish and pitiful bete noire keen on the confrontation with compatriots in the north.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group of traitors, the kingpins of the evils, should be rooted out in order to prevent the maltreatment of children in south Korea, a tundra of human rights and a hell-like society where children are subject to violence and death.

articles.title: AINDF Calls upon All Koreans to Turn Out in Struggle to End Park Geun Hye Regime
articles.content:
AINDF Calls upon All Koreans to Turn Out in Struggle to End Park Geun Hye Regime 
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) Saturday made public an appeal to all the people.
					 Recalling that south Korea is now seething with the fierce struggle against the Park Geun Hye regime which is committing the most shameful crimes of treachery unprecedented in history, the appeal went on:
					
					 The escalating struggle against the "government" in different parts is the brave eruption of resistance and will of all the people not to tolerate the Park Geun Hye regime's unpopular rule, corruption and incompetence, pro-U.S. policy and policy of confrontation with compatriots any longer.
					
					 All the crimes of the Park's regime are a vicious challenge to the mindset of the people desirous of justice and truth and a declaration of a war against the fellow countrymen hoping for peace and reunification.
					
					 Our people will be driven deeper into the slough of poverty and they cannot escape the miserable disaster of a nuclear war entailed by the evil cycle of the confrontation with compatriots as long as Park Geun Hye, hateful pronoun of arrogance and self-complacency, misunderstanding, arbitrary practices, incompetence and ignorance, stays in Chongwadae.
					
					 All the people!
					
					 Let us turn out in the nationwide resistance to end the Park Geun Hye group!
					
					 Let all workers decisively smash the system of paying salaries according to piece rate, new slave system, with united struggle!
					
					 Let all peasants overthrow the Park Geun Hye regime devastating land of life of peasants with unprecedented murderous agricultural policy and build a new world where peasants live as befitting human being by our own efforts!
					
					 Let all youth take the lead in the anti-Park Geun Hye struggle to get out of disgraceful plight!
					
					 Let all women bravely join in the nationwide resistance judging the Park Geun Hye regime which brought the era of disregarding women with sex inequality and wage distinction!
					
					 Let all religionists bravely turn out in the just struggle to push into hell the evil group of Park Geun Hye trying to turn religious Holy Land into a military base of outside forces and target of nuclear strike!
					
					 Let all the people throw into the rubbish heap of history pro-U.S. traitorous group of Park Geun Hye trying to deploy THAAD in this land at any cost going against mindset of the people!
					
					 Let all the people turn out in the anti-Park Geun Hye struggle through death-defying resistance and bring about a new world of a reunified powerful and prosperous country, genuine world of working people free from subordination, submission, exploitation, oppression, flunkeyism and treachery, at an early date!

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Here
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Here
Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Japan-DPRK Friendship Kyoto Net led by Vice-Chairman Yudaka Tsunogai arrived here Saturday.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Warmongers Commit Military Provocation in Hotspot Waters in West Sea of Korea
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Warmongers Commit Military Provocation in Hotspot Waters in West Sea of Korea
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet military warmongers are escalating the intrusion into the territorial waters of the north side in the hotspot waters in the West Sea of Korea recently.
					 Their intrusions that have been perpetrated almost every day this month stretched into Oct. 13 and 14.
					
					 They kicked off the intrusion by infiltrating warships and civilian fishing boats, nine in all, into the waters of the north side beyond the maritime military demarcation line from before dawn on Oct. 14.
					
					 The provocateurs had been busy sailing around the waters for several hours. They took to flight in a hurry, taken aback by the strong warnings of the north side and its readiness to take counter-action.
					
					 But they kept seizing opportunities to intrude into the waters of the north side again.
					
					 They perpetrated five intrusions on Oct. 14 alone.
					
					 What merits a more serious attention is that the puppet military warmongers' intrusions were simultaneously committed in all territorial waters including those around Paekryong and Yongphyong islands.
					
					 The more undisguised and persistent intrusions into the territorial waters of the north side in the hotspot waters in the West Sea of Korea were perpetrated under the direct instructions of Chongwadae and the puppet Ministry of Defense.
					
					 The purpose of their frantic military provocations in the hotspot waters in the West Sea is to preserve the illegal "northern limit line." They are also aimed to create opportunities of military clashes at any cost in a bid to prompt the north to take counteraction for self-defence and make a "preemptive attack on the north" under this pretence.
					
					 No matter how desperately the south Korean puppet forces try to defend "the northern limit line," it will be the death line of wringing their necks and the hotspot waters in the West Sea will be hell-like ones for the confrontation maniacs keen on naval intrusions.

articles.title: DPRK Embassy in Moscow Hosts Reception
articles.content:
DPRK Embassy in Moscow Hosts Reception
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Embassy in Moscow arranged a reception on Oct. 12 to mark the 68th anniversary of the establishment of the DPRK-Russia diplomatic relations.
					 Present there on invitation were a vice-minister of Development of Far East, the roving ambassador of the Foreign Ministry, the chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK and other Russian personages.
					
					 The DPRK ambassador to Russia and his embassy officials were on hand.
					
					 The vice-minister of Development of Far East said in his speech that the DPRK and Russia are close neighbors and have carried forward solid ties of friendship and good-neighborliness for a long period.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries opened the way for steadily developing the multifaceted and mutually beneficial relations of friendship and cooperation.
					
					 The two countries have made great progress in cooperation between the governments, regions, organizations and institutions.
					
					 We are ready to make close cooperation for peace and security of the Korean peninsula and the region.
					
					 We wish the Korean people greater success in all fields and happiness and prosperity.

articles.title: Framework for 1,700 Flats Completed in Hoeryong City
articles.content:
Framework for 1,700 Flats Completed in Hoeryong City
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Housing construction has been hastened in flood-hit Hoeryong City, North Hamgyong Province of the DPRK.
					Soldier-builders finished the framework for more than 1,700 flats in the city by Thursday, thus opening up a bright prospect for completing the housing construction until the end of this month.
					
					 Now, the city is busy with the plastering of inside and outside of the flats and the rezoning of their surroundings.

articles.title: Results of Housing Construction in Disaster Areas of DPRK
articles.content:
Results of Housing Construction in Disaster Areas of DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- A rapid progress has been made at housing construction sites in flood-hit northern part of the DPRK.
					 According to data available, the framework of new flats was finished in the main in the disaster areas as a whole by October 10. Some construction units have already completed the housing construction.
					
					 In Hoeryong City and Yonsa County, soldier-builders finished the framework of houses ahead of schedule and entered the last stage of housing construction.
					
					 Taking part in the recovery efforts are many servicepersons, employees of national institutions, builders and shock-brigade members from different parts of the country.

articles.title: Progress Made in Sea Transport of Aid Materials to Disaster Areas
articles.content:
Progress Made in Sea Transport of Aid Materials to Disaster Areas
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Signal achievements have been made in sea transport of building materials to the flood-hit northern part of the DPRK.
					 According to data available, the Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport carried 7,000 more tons of cement than planned by October 10.
					
					 Involving in the marine transport of aid materials to the disaster areas are Kanggye, Chongbong and all other cargo vessels belonging to the ministry.
					
					 Technical Innovation proposals were positively introduced to shorten the time of cement shipment and departure.

articles.title: Drive for Increased Production Brisk in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Drive for Increased Production Brisk in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Industrial establishments in Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, have conducted a vigorous drive for increased production to supply more consumer goods and building materials to the flood-hit northern part of the country.
					 The Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill turned out hundreds of thousands of meters of cloth and the Pyongyang Mechanical Pencil Factory tens of thousands of mechanical pencils in a short span of time.
					
					 Knitwear and daily necessities factories provided a great deal of quality underwear and vinyl sheets, plastic pipes, packing container, waterproof cloth and other goods to the disaster areas.
					
					 The Pyongyang Metallic Building Materials Factory doubled daily production plan and the Taesong Ceramic Factory finished the planned sanitary ware production in 10 days.

articles.title: Second-fishing in Cage-net Fish Farm in Taedong River
articles.content:
Second-fishing in Cage-net Fish Farm in Taedong River
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The cage-net fish farm, displayed in the Taedong River of Pyongyang, conducted its second fishing on October 9.
					 It made a good haul of catfish in September. 
					
					 Up to now, the farm has gathered more than 10 tons of silver carp, Ryongjong fish, carp and Cristaria plicata.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts Desperate Campaign of U.S. against DPRK
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts Desperate Campaign of U.S. against DPRK 
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Shocked by the growing nuclear muscle of the DPRK, the Obama administration has gone reckless in its anti-DPRK campaign.
					 The administration has intensified the surveillance of areas of the DPRK with all its various type reconnaissance assets involved and let its nuclear strategic bomber B-1Bs frequently fly over the Korean peninsula.
					
					 U.S. early warning satellites are keeping watch on the whole of the peninsula day and night and 4 reconnaissance planes EO-5Cs deployed in a military base of U.S. forces present in south Korea are carrying out a round-the-clock mission to gather information about areas of the north side by shifts and, at the same time, E-8C, an ultra modern reconnaissance plane for land surveillance deployed in a U.S. military base in Okinawa, is flying over the peninsula to spy on the military movements in the DPRK.
					
					 In the meantime, the U.S. allotted 16 million U.S. dollars in aid to the organizations to develop and distribute the programs for psychological warfare against the DPRK.
					
					 These are nothing but the last-ditch efforts of the administration facing a failure in its hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 It is well known that the aim sought by the administration in enforcing such policy is to bring down the socialist system of the DPRK, the cradle of the Korean people's happy life. And its hostile nature remains unchanged.
					
					 The above-said policy designed to physically eliminate the state and people of the DPRK, has not been eased but has gone beyond the tolerance limit.
					
					 Tragedy is that the Obama administration is persisting in its high-handed actions against the DPRK, far from drawing a lesson from its bankrupt policy toward the DPRK even in the closing period of office.
					
					 It is the U.S., to be exact, the Obama administration that compelled the DPRK to make redoubled efforts to bolster up its nuclear force in the final phase at so high cost.
					
					 The DPRK took a series of measures for bolstering up its nuclear force in succession. It was an unavoidable and just option to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the vital rights of the nation from the worst political and economic pressure and military threat of the U.S. and its vassal forces.
					
					 At present the DPRK has got everything it had desired and has gone through the final process for rounding off the state nuclear force.
					
					 The DPRK, a nuclear power in the East, is pressurizing the U.S. with its powerful military muscle.
					
					 No matter what desperate frenzy the U.S. may make on its decline as seen above, the strategic position of the DPRK and the trend of the times will remain unchanged.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK have the existing military counteraction mode shifted to that of preemptive attack to cope with the moves of the enemies to stifle the DPRK. All its operational groups are fully ready to make merciless deadly strikes, should they show even a slight sign of provocation.
					
					 The American politicians had better deal with the issue of the Korean peninsula with reason, drawing a lesson from their past failures and the present realities.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Inheriting Spirit of DIU
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Inheriting Spirit of DIU
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday dedicates an article to the 90th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 The idea of independence, sovereignty and socialism against imperialism held high by the DIU fully reflects the law-governed requirements of the struggle to achieve the independence of the country and the nation and serves as a just and noble idea as it foresaw the revolution and construction in our era, the complete victory of socialism and the distant future of the cause of global independence, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The course of the glorious struggle of the Korean revolution for nine decades since the formation of the DIU which declared a fresh start of the Korean revolution represents a proud history in which it has fully demonstrated the invincible cause of the DIU.
					
					 The invincibility and eternal viability of the cause of the DIU are based on the idea and feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The glorious tradition of the DIU was established by Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He founded the immortal Juche idea, remarkably strengthened the driving force of the revolution, successfully accomplished the cause of building the party, army and state with the first generation of the Songun revolution as its core and turned the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defense. This was the fruition of the embodiment of the spirit and idea of the DIU.
					
					 The cause of the DIU greeted the shining heyday thanks to Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, the Juche idea, the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung, was developed in depth into the guiding idea, guidelines in the era of independence, the revolutionary tradition of Juche provided by him was established in all fields, the Workers' Party of Korea grew stronger to be the revolutionary party of Juche type which inherited the tradition of the DIU and the ideal of socialism put forth by the DIU is being translated into a brilliant reality.
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Juche, the revolutionary cause of Songun started by Kim Il Sung and led by Kim Jong Il along the road of victory and glory is being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un , another peerlessly great man of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Warns Provocateurs of Merciless Counteraction
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Warns Provocateurs of Merciless Counteraction
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers are openly attempting to mount a preemptive attack on the north after throwing away even the deceptive mask of "defense." Their reckless moves was prompted by their ignorance and misjudgment of their rival. Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The DPRK emerged a nuclear power in the East possessed of even H-bomb, a recognized strategic rocket power.
					
					 Ridiculous enough are feebleminded thinking and hysteric fit of the U.S. and puppet warmongers as they are seized with the daydream of mounting a reckless preemptive attack on the north, failing to judge the dramatically changed strategic position of the DPRK after ranking itself among nuclear powers and subsequent altered trend of the times.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet group's scenario for preemptive attack on the north deprived the army of the DPRK of its slightest patience. 
					
					 Logic is unworkable on the warmongers as they lack normal thinking. Merciless strike is, therefore, cure-all for them. 
					
					 If the U.S. and the puppet forces show even the slightest sign of preemptive strike, it will entail prompt military counteraction of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army, and its deadly nuclear retaliatory strike will be the most merciless and toughest military action.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules Park Geun Hye's Invectives against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules Park Geun Hye's Invectives against DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye at a "video state council meeting" on October 11 called for "harsher sanctions" against the DPRK, terming its measures to bolster up nuclear deterrence for self-defence "provocations."
					 Commenting on her vituperation, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says:
					
					 No matter how noisily Park Geun Hye may cry out for sanctions at Chongwadae, the DPRK regards it as no more than barks of a rabid dog at the moon,
					
					 What Park uttered is nothing but vituperation and hoarse grumbling let out by the witch at Chongwadae, frightened by the powerful nuclear deterrence of the DPRK and its eye-opening reality.
					
					 Park is apt to cry out for "harsher sanctions" against the DPRK in a bid to do harm to it, but it is the behavior of a lunatic who is utterly ignorant and dull-witted.
					
					 There is a saying that the sparrow near the school sings the primer. Park Geun Hye should have known that anti-DPRK sanctions are as foolish an act as sweeping the sea with a broom as she has stayed in Chongwadae for such a long period.
					
					 A sinister intention is lurking behind the reckless remarks made by her calling for tightening the sanctions against the north over "provocation".
					
					 In a word, she desperately seeks to stir up security uneasiness in the south Korean society and fan up the confrontation with the compatriots in the north in an effort to divert elsewhere the angry public criticism of her and her cohorts and tide over the worst ruling crisis.
					
					 Park is crazy enough to kick up her anti-DPRK confrontation racket to get rid of her pretty fix. However, it would get her nowhere.

articles.title: U.S. Aggressor Forces in S. Korea Enjoy Special Privilege
articles.content:
U.S. Aggressor Forces in S. Korea Enjoy Special Privilege
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that U.S. aggressor forces have enjoyed a special privilege even in using electricity, inviting strong public criticism.
					 According to the data revealed by a lawmaker from an opposition party on Oct. 5, the U.S. aggressor forces are getting a 18.3 percent discount in paying for electricity compared with the south Korean puppet army.

articles.title: S. Korean Civic and Public Organizations Support Strike of Workers
articles.content:
S. Korean Civic and Public Organizations Support Strike of Workers
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The April 16 Solidarity, Public Traffic Network, Civic and Public Joint Action for Strengthening Public Nature and Checking Forcible Dismissal according to Piece Rate, Transport Industrial Council of the Public Transport Workers Trade Union and other organizations in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Oct. 11 supporting the general strike of railway and freight workers, according to a report.
					 At the press conference speakers said 12,319 persons were killed due to freight traffic accidents over the past ten years because of long-hour labor.
					
					 They charged that there is no security of the people as long as there is the exploitation by the regime and plutocrats lending no ear to the voices of the railway and freight workers calling for ensuring the people's security.
					
					 They called for building a society where workers are happy and the people are stable.

articles.title: S. Korean Fascist Police Suppress Workers' Struggle
articles.content:
S. Korean Fascist Police Suppress Workers' Struggle 
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities hurled the fascist police into the scenes of workers' actions for defending their vital rights to mercilessly suppress them, according to reports.
					 When more than 14,000 trade union members of the Freight Workers' Solidarity launched full-scale strike in protest against evil labor policy on October 10, the fascist police mobilized thousands of repressive forces including mobile detective corps to crack down on their struggle. 
					
					 The police took away three unionists and trampled down one person so mercilessly that he was carried to a hospital. In the evening the police walked off five unionists. For three days the police took away 50 unionists and some others were wounded.
					
					 Members of the Confederation of Trade Unions, the Public Transport Trade Unions, the Freight Workers' Solidarity and the Bar Association for Democratic Society and opposition party members held a press conference at the "National Assembly" on October 12 to bitterly denounce the authorities' suppression.
					
					 Speakers there demanded the "government" stop the suppression and give up politics of misunderstanding.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Authorities Hell Bent on Collecting Taxes
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Authorities Hell Bent on Collecting Taxes 
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that additional taxes were imposed on inhabitants by order of the puppet authorities.
					 This year, resident's tax jumped in more than 100 different places, touching off the anger of people from all walks of life.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Form Special Unit for Preemptive Attack on North
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Form Special Unit for Preemptive Attack on North
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet warmongers are massively increasing forces for special warfare to mount a surprise preemptive attack on the north, according to a report.
					 The Special Warfare Command of the south Korean puppet Army is promoting the formation of an air force unit for special operation for ensuring secret infiltration into the north's area and a special operation unit for performing "strategic special duty", according to its announcement on October 12.
					
					 It claims that this is aimed to independently carry out the infiltration operation without support of the Air Force Operation Command of the Army or the U.S. forces in contingency.

articles.title: Bus Accident Claims Casualties in S. Korea
articles.content:
Bus Accident Claims Casualties in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- There was a bus accident on a highway leading to Ulsan from Taegu airport on Oct. 13, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 The bus bumped into a concrete facility on the roadside at dead of night to be engulfed in flames.
					
					 The fire left ten passengers dead and seven seriously wounded.

articles.title: Brief Biography of Kim Jong Il Introduced in Romania
articles.content:
Brief Biography of Kim Jong Il Introduced in Romania 
Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The brief biography of leader Kim Jong Il was posted by the Romanian Workers' Association on the website Romania Muncitoare on October 5 on the 71st anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Int'l Body Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Int'l Body Pays Tribute to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- An event was held by the Organization of Solidarity of the Peoples of Africa, Asia and Latin America on October 7 to mark the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present at the event were the general secretary and members of the organization, the DPRK ambassador to Cuba and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung and paid tribute to him.
					
					 The general secretary said the WPK has covered the course of victory and glory for a long period with the Juche idea as its guiding idea under the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung. He went on:
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung is, indeed, the prominent leader with foresightedness.
					
					 The WPK has turned into the powerful party deeply rooted among the popular masses thanks to the great leaders.
					
					 The respected Comrade Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the cause of the preceding leaders leads the Korean people to make a series of eye-opening successes in all fields despite the hostile forces' moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The Korean people will achieve greater successes in the building of a socialist power under the wise leadership of the WPK.

articles.title: Joint Seminar Held in Berlin
articles.content:
Joint Seminar Held in Berlin
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- The German National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea held in Berlin on Oct. 7 a joint seminar on supreme leader Kim Jong Un's Report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee. It was held to mark the 19th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the 71st founding anniversary of the WPK and the 90th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 Present at the seminar were chiefs and members of the German National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and its affiliated Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il, the Hannover Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea. 
					
					 The chairman of the national committee and other speakers said Kim Jong Un's report is an important programme indicating the bright ways for developing the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, accomplishing the cause of socialism and achieving the reunification of Korea and global independence. 
					
					 They noted that the WPK, which has inherited the tradition of the Down-with-Imperialism Union and is holding Kim Jong Il as eternal leader and Kim Jong Un as its top leader, will make a long drive in the future, too.
					
					 Meanwhile, an annual meeting of the national committee took place on the same day. It reviewed its activities for this year and discussed the orientation of its work for next year.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Exhibitions Held in Mongolia
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Exhibitions Held in Mongolia
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- Kimjongilia exhibition opened with due ceremony in Ulan Bator, Mongolia on Oct. 6 on the 71st anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 90th anniversary of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 Displayed at the venue of the opening ceremony were photos showing the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un for founding and consolidating the WPK.
					
					 On display there were 300 potted Kimjongilias, their works and publications introducing the DPRK.
					
					 S. Sodbatar, chairman of the Kimjongilia Association of Mongolia, in his speech, said Oct. 10 is the day when the WPK was founded, adding:
					
					 The great President Kim Il Sung formed the DIU in his teens, thus providing the historic root of the WPK.
					
					 The Korean people praise the WPK as the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the mother party that they entrust their destinies to and follow.
					
					 The WPK prioritizes defending the people's interests and improving their living and enforces a policy of love and trust.
					
					 The Korean people hold in high esteem HE Kim Jong Un as chairman of the WPK and are waging a dynamic struggle to build a socialist power by meeting all challenges of the hostile forces.
					
					 The Korean people led by him will always enjoy victory and glory in the future.

articles.title: DPRK Books Donated to Russia
articles.content:
DPRK Books Donated to Russia
 Pyongyang, October 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK books were donated to Russia with due ceremony at the Maritime Territorial National Library Named after Maxim Gorky of Russia on Oct. 5 on the occasion of the 71st founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 90th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 Among them are works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books introducing socio-politics, history and culture of Korea.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Associate Professor Maltseva at Far Eastern State University, members of the library and officials of the DPRK mission in Vladivostok.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de condolencia a principe heredero de Tailandia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de condolencia a principe heredero de Tailandia
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, remitio el dia 15 un mensaje de consuelo a Maha Vajiralongkorn, principe heredero del Reino de Tailandia.
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					Informado de la triste noticia de que fallecio Su Majestad Bhumibol Adulyadej, rey de Tailandia, expreso mi profundo pesame y consuelo a su Alteza real, y por su conducto, a los familiares del difunto, al gobierno y al pueblo del Reino de Tailandia.
					
					Su Majestad Bhumibol Adulyadej aprecio mucho las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre dos paises RPDC y Tailandia e hizo gran aporte a su desarrollo.
					
					Si bien fallecio Su Majestad Bhumibol Adulyadej, se quedaran para siempre sus valiosas proezas en el alma de los pueblos de nuestros dos paises y de la humanidad progresista.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX condena insulto de Russel contra la maxima dignidad de RPDC
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX condena insulto de Russel contra la maxima dignidad de RPDC
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 15 la siguiente declaracion:
					Llega a la fase contradictoria la extremada conducta hostil de EE.UU. que critica la dignidad de la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC.
					
					El pasado dia 12, el asistente del secretario para Asia Oriental y el Pacifico del Departamento de Estado de EE.UU., Daniel Russel, calumnio atrevidamente la dignidad de la Direccion Suprema de nuestro pais diciendo que esta se acabara en el momento en que tengamos la capacidad de cumplir el ataque nuclear. 
					
					Esto es el desafio mas grave a nuestro pais y accion hostil para poner en practica la declaracion de guerra que nos han hecho. 
					
					Pero, el disparate grosero de Russel es una paradoja porque la realidad es diametralmente contraria a lo que dice el. 
					
					La Casa Blanca se eliminara primero en el momento en que EE.UU. acometa contra nuestro pais. 
					
					La sofisteria de Russel no pasa de ser el alarido agonico para eludir la responsabilidad de haberse reconocido el fracaso total de la politica anti-RPDC de la banda de Obama, que saldra pronto de la Casa Blanca, y puesto en peligro la seguridad del territorio estadounidense al obligar a la RPDC a convertirse en el mas poderoso pais con armas nucleares. 
					
					No conoce todavia a nuestro pais si bien ese tipejo viene interviniendo durante mas de 20 anos en la politica sobre Corea. Pues, son muy miserables los habitantes estadounidenses que encargan la seguridad nacional a tales ignorantes. 
					
					Debido a la megalomania de que puede hacer todo lo que le de la gana, EE.UU. no sabe todavia que la RPDC no es un pais que se mueve a sus mandatos. 
					
					La maldicion de Russel es precisamente el alarido del que esta detras, Obama. 
					
					La RPDC no se amilana ni un comino ante los esfuerzos desesperados de Obama. Y nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias, incluso las nucleares en alto nivel, que consideran como su primera mision la defensa a ultranza a la Direccion Suprema, no perderan en ningun caso su blanco. 
					
					EE.UU. pagara muy caro su calumnia a la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y Obama lo experimentara antes de que se retire de la Casa Blanca.

articles.title: UMDC denuncia maltrato a ninos en el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
UMDC denuncia maltrato a ninos en el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que se generaliza el maltrato a los ninos en la sociedad surcoreana, la portavoz del Comite Central de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea dio el dia 15 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					Segun el reciente reporte de la Asamblea Nacional del Sur de Corea, los casos de maltrato infantil se totalizaron en el ultimo lustro en 40 mil 999, incluso el asesinato de 197 infantes con menos de 12 anos, y en particular, ocurrieron 11 mil 715 casos en el ano pasado. 
					
					Esta cifra demuestra que despues de la toma del poder de Park Geun-hye, tales casos se duplicaron casi en comparacion con el ano 2011 cuando se registraron 6 mil 58. 
					
					Lo intolerable es que las nineras expulsan afuera a los ninos en la estacion invernal despues de desnudarlos, les encierran en la habitacion amordazando con panuelos y cometen hasta el crimen de tirarlos desde el tercer piso del edificio. 
					
					Estas barbaridades sin parangon en el mundo son el resultado inevitable del corrupto regimen social del Sur de Corea. 
					
					El ultraje a la poblacion infantil llega a la fase irremediable aunque la traidora Park Geun-hye, quien no experimento el amor maternal, prometio el "sistema de crianza responsable" y la "ampliacion de crianza gratuita" al tomar el poder. 
					
					A pesar de esto, la banda de Park Geun-hye hace vista gorda de la deplorable situacion de derechos humanos del Sur de Corea y cuestiona tanto el supuesto "problema de DDHH" para calumniar a la parte connacional. 
					
					Park, psicopata y maniaca de enfrentamiento fratricida, censura la situacion de "DDHH" de la parte connacional instigando a las escorias humanas que cometieron crimenes intolerables y huyeron al Sur de Corea traicionando a la patria. 
					
					Hay que eliminar a la camarilla de Park Geun-hye, causa principal de todos los males, para frenar el maltrato infantil en la infernal sociedad surcoreana donde se hacen victimas de violencia y muerte tragica hasta los infantes que deben crecer bajo el amor y proteccion de la sociedad y sus padres.

articles.title: CC de FDNA llama a los coreanos a sepultar el "gobierno" de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
CC de FDNA llama a los coreanos a sepultar el "gobierno" de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Comite Central del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista hizo publico el dia 15 un llamamiento dirigido a toda la nacion coreana.
					Segun la nota, en este territorio se desarrolla mas furiosamente la lucha contra el "poder" de Park Geun-hye que comete uno tras otro los crimenes mas vergonzosos y traidores a la nacion, nunca vistos antes en la historia. 
					
					Las llamaradas de la lucha "antigubernamental", que se avivan en toda las extension surcoreana, son la explosion de la protesta y la voluntad de todos los habitantes de no perdonar por mas tiempo la politica antipopular del "poder" de Park, sus irregularidades, su impotencia, su servilismo proyanqui y su politica de confrontacion fratricida, revela el documento y prosigue:
					
					Los crimenes del "poder" de Park son un desafio frontal a la opinion publica aspirante a la justicia y la verdad y una declaracion de guerra contra la parte connacional que desea la paz y la reunificacion.
					
					Mientras que Park, pronombre de la arrogancia y egoismo, la obstinacion y tirania, la impotencia e ignorancia, se mantenga en Chongwadae, los coreanos sufriran solo las penurias y jamas podran evitar la calamidad de guerra nuclear causada del circulo vicioso del enfrentamiento fratricida. 
					
					!Todos los habitantes!
					
					!Que se movilicen en la resistencia pannacional para sepultar a los compinches de Park Geun-hye!
					
					!Que los obreros frustren rotundamente mediante la lucha unida el sistema de salario anual para los ameritados que es regimen de neo-esclavitud!
					
					!Que los campesinos sustituyan el "poder" de Park Geun-hye que con la asesina politica agricola sin precedentes, devasta el terreno de vida de los campesinos, y traigan con sus manos un nuevo mundo en que puedan vivir dignamente!
					
					!Que los jovenes se pongan al frente de la lucha para acabar con Park Geun-hye!
					
					!Que las mujeres tomen parte activa en la resistencia pannacional para sentenciar al "gobierno" de Park que trajo la era de desprecio a las mujeres al practicar la discriminacion sexual y de salarios!
					
					!Que los religiosos participen osadamente en la lucha justa para castigar a la malvada horda de Park que trata de convertir hasta el lugar sagrado de religion en la base militar de las fuerzas extranjeras y en el blanco de golpe nuclear!
					
					!Que todos los habitantes echen al basurero de la historia a los compinches de Park, horda traidora de servilismo proyanqui, que se desesperan por emplazar cueste lo que cueste el THAAD en este territorio desafiando a la opinion publica!
					
					Al finalizar, el llamamiento exhorto a movilizarse generalmente mediante la protesta a ultranza en la lucha anti-Park para construir cuanto antes el mundo verdadero para la poblacion trabajadora, donde no hay subyugacion ni humillacion ni explotacion ni represion ni servilismo a grandes potencias, y lograr la potencia reunificada y prospera.

articles.title: Ofrecido banquete en embajada coreana en Rusia
articles.content:
Ofrecido banquete en embajada coreana en Rusia 
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 68o aniversario de establecimiento de relaciones diplomaticas entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Federacion Rusa, la embajada coreana en Rusia ofrecio el dia 12 un banquete. 
					Fueron invitados a la recepcion el viceministro de Desarrollo de Lejano Oriente, el embajador itinerante de la cancilleria, el presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad y Cooperacion Cultural con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y otras personalidades de diferentes sectores de Rusia. Y estuvieron presentes el embajador y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica coreana en Rusia. 
					
					En la ocasion hubo discursos. 
					
					El viceministro de Desarrollo de Lejano Oriente dijo que la RPDC es vecino intimo de Rusia y durante largo tiempo y los dos paises han mantenido la solida amistad y los lazos de buena vecindad. 
					
					Subrayo que el establecimiento de relaciones diplomaticas entre dos paises abrio la via de desarrollar constantemente las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion multifaceticas y de beneficios mutuos. 
					
					Afirmo que los dos paises lograron grandes exitos en la cooperacion entre los gobiernos, regiones, entidades y organos. 
					
					Estamos listos para estrechar la cooperacion para la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de la region, aseguro y deseo que el pueblo coreano alcance mayores exitos en todos los dominios y tenga la felicidad y prosperidad.

articles.title: Se repite incursion de buques surcoreanos en la candente zona del Mar Oeste
articles.content:
Se repite incursion de buques surcoreanos en la candente zona del Mar Oeste
Pyongyang, 15 de octubre (ACNC) -- Ultimamente, los belicistas del circulo militar surcoreano amplian escalonadamente los actos de incursion en las aguas de la parte Norte en la zona candente del Mar Oeste de Corea. 
					Esta provocacion militar se reporta casi todos los dias en el mes en curso y prosiguio hasta los dias 13 y 14.
					
					El dia 14, comenzo desde antes de la amanecida con la infiltracion de 9 buques de guerra y barcos pesqueros civiles a las aguas al norte de la linea de demarcacion militar maritima de la parte Norte. 
					
					Los provocadores, que deambulaban en esa zona cometiendo por varias horas la intrusion, la parada y el traslado de barcos, huyeron a toda prisa atemorizados ante la fuerte advertencia y el movimiento de reaccion militar de la parte Norte.
					
					Pero, repitieron el mismo acto provocador en los momentos oportunos.
					
					Solo en el dia 14, se reportaron 5 casos de intrusion.
					
					El problema es que la invasion maritima se perpetra de modo simultaneo y multiple en casi todas las zonas maritimas, inclusive en las aguas de las islas Paekryong y Yonphyong.
					
					La infiltracion, que se torna cada vez mas abierta y brutal, obedece a la orden directa de Chongwadae y el Ministerio de Defensa Nacional del Sur de Corea.
					
					La escalada de demenciales provocaciones militares en la zona candente persigue el objetivo de mantener la ilegal "linea de limite al Norte" y preparar a toda costa la oportunidad de choque armado a fin de causar la reaccion de autodefensa de la RPDC que les serviria de pretexto a los titeres surcoreanos para asestar el "golpe preventivo de agresion al Norte de Corea".
					
					Si bien ellos se obstinan en mantener la "linea de limite al Norte", esta sera la de muerte para los provocadores y las aguas mas candentes del Mar Oeste se convertiran en una pesadilla e infierno para los maniacos de enfrentamiento acostumbrados a la incursion maritima.
